    Multi-Channel Potentiostat
    Electrochemical Analyzer

    The Smallest Wireless Potentiostat

    ECWP100

    • Finger-size potentiostat
    • Wireless connect, plug and play
    • Expanded to 8 Channels
    • Two interface type for almost all electrodes

    • Unique technology

      In order to meet the latest academic research trend and product development needs, we combined our product development experience to launch the smallest wireless potentiostat ,which has outstanding accuracy and sensitivity required by sensor development.

    • Finger-sized wireless potentiostat

      Smallest and lightest,used in tight enclosed space

      You can accurately control the experimental conditions in a very tight space and improve the stability of the experimental conditions.It is suitable for experiments which is required accurate control of ambient gas concentration, temperature and other conditions

    • Wireless connection, trend of the industry

      Wireless potentiostat can meet the development needs of remote sensors without power ,suitable for outdoor, smart farm, smart home, smart medical, IoT sensors, etc.

      *It can be used for 3-6 hours with full charge, and the service time is related to the transmission distance. It can also be connected to mobile power supply or ordinary power supply

    • 穿戴式傳感器的研發

      The foundation of smart life and wearable smart device is sensor development. The wearable sensor can monitor user's behavior and environmental changes, which providing big data to smart products operation so as to take direct action to meet the user's needs. Our wireless research platform can shorter your development time.

    • Growable potentiostat

      Expanded to 8 channels available

      Coordinated Mode： Multiple electrodes can be tested together under the same experimental conditions to ensure the reliability and reproducibility of experimental data.

      Separated Mode： Each sensor can perform different detection methods on the same sample, and more experimental data can be obtained faster.

      Smart Hub

      Charging Station+Signal Receiver

      • *Two power modes：USB power or AC power
      • * It can provide 6 connectors for quick charging at the same time
      • * Up to 8-channels signal can be received simultaneously

    • Reliable 2.4G transmission technology, no pairing, plug and play

      The data transmission distance is up to 20m

    • Two kinds of connection interface, easy conversion

      Screen printed electrode or crocodile clip, one second quick change

      *Standard kit is not include alligator clip interface,it should be purchased additionally

    Electrochemical
    Methods    		(A)Cyclic voltammetry(CV)
    (B)Amperometry(IT)
    (C)Open circuit potentiometry(OCP)
    (D)Differential pulse voltammetry(DPV)
    (E)Square wave voltammetry(SWV)
    (F)Linear sweep voltammetry(LSV)
    Range(A)Voltage range scan :+2~-2(v) OCP voltage range:+1800mV~-1800mV
    (B)Current range:1x10-3 ~1x10 -10 (A)
    (C)Current resolution:0.5% of current range
    (D)Maximum wireless distance:20m
    Operation systemwindow 7 and / or above
    CommunicationUSB1.1 and 2.4G RF
    Power(A)Remoter input: DC 5V,2A
    Connector input:DC 5V,0.5A
    (B)Battery life:1~6 Hr
    DimensionRemoter input:125x73x25mm
    Connector input: 58x20.5x18.5mm
    WeightRemoter input: ~150g
    Connector input:~25g

    Note1：Simulation function-The test steps can be burned into a replaceable chip, so a large number of test samples can be tested offline, and the required values can be read directly on the panel .That will simulate the process of product model development.
